    CHERI

    CHERI Workshops

    In 2016, we held a CHERI Microkernel Workshop in Cambridge, associated with EuroSys 2016 taking place in London, UK.

    In 2022, we held a CHERI workshop and tutorial in Lausanne, Switzerland, associated with ASPLOS 2022. This was a hybrid event due to the ongoing pandemic.

    In 2022, we held a Software porting to CHERI memory safety workshop during a Digital Security by Design All Hands event.

    In 2023, we plan to hold a CHERI workshop and tutorial in Koblenz, Germany associated with SOSP 2023.
